title: The Karate Kid (feat. Tony Roberts)
description:
Comedian Tony Roberts joins the show and tells Jay and Dan and has his own hot topic about Wendy Williams. Tony tells the gang about backlash from a  joke, and karate fighting in the army!

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire

Follow us on all social media @TheBonfireXM

@DanSoder www.DanSoder.com

@BigJayOakerson www.BigJayComedy.com

@tonytroberts

#CrackleCrackle
